workhorse function for brainconn()

Source: R/build_plot.R
build_plot.Rd

returns a ggraph object of plotted brain connectivity matrix

build_plot(
  conmat,
  data,
  data.row = NULL,
  data.col = NULL,
  background,
  node.size,
  node.color = "network",
  thr = NULL,
  uthr = NULL,
  view,
  edge.color,
  edge.alpha,
  edge.width,
  show.legend,
  label.size,
  labels,
  include.vec = NULL,
  scale.edge.width,
  edge.color.weighted,
  label.edge.weight,
  ...
)
